title: God Is In The Rain
description: The Book Is a Story-telling about the philosophy of life in war and romance, written by a 26 years old Iraqi engineer who lived most of his life in Iraq, witnessing war and life during the Sanction, He is always lived reading books of Philosophy and History, he wrote this book to reflect not his experience in life but to reflect what he thinks about the experience surrounded him in his life.God is in the rain, is a story about an old man who tells stories to children in a fantasy and realistic way to grab their attention, to show his own philosophy about life, religion and love. In the end of the book, The author shared three of his poems concerning , Romance, War and Philosophy of life to add more deep meaning to the reader.
author: Mohamed Amer
